data.title: Podcast Forum
data.text:
Podcast Forum 2023: Let's talk podcasting!

7 - 8 Sep 2023

We are delighted to invite you to the second edition of the EBU Podcast Forum, this year hosted by NRK in Oslo.

The EBU Podcast Forum brings together senior podcast professionals and producers to discuss all topics related to building a successful podcast strategy, podcast production and formats. Itâ€™s also an opportunity to share their knowledge and expertise in areas such as benchmarking for audio content, KPIs for commissioning, efficient internal production workflows and cross-team cooperation, and the development of new formats.

The agenda combines knowledge sharing and discussions with format presentations and pitches. Participants are encouraged to exchange audio formats and take a deep dive into all things related to podcasts and public service radio.

One of the main focus topics of the 2023 edition is podcasting and young audiences (kids and youth).

This event is open to EBU Members only, it will be of interest to podcast producers, content creators, programme directors, heads of digital, heads of programming, heads of podcast teams, etc. Anyone working for a public service broadcaster, producing podcast formats, developing podcast strategies, or working with on-demand content and platforms is welcome to join.

Take a look at the photos from the 2023 edition.

Call for podcast formats

The 2023 call for podcast formats is now closed. Those whose submissions have been selected for presentation at the EBU Podcast Forum and/or inclusion in the EBU podcast catalogue that will be published ahead of the event will be informed by the end of June.
